bioconda.name: bioconductor-annotationforge
bioconda.summary: Tools for building SQLite-based annotation data packages

biotools.summary: Provides code for generating Annotation packages and their databases. Packages produced are intended to be used with AnnotationDbi.

bioschemas.name: AnnotationForge
bioschemas.summary: Provides code for generating Annotation packages and their databases. Packages produced are intended to be used with AnnotationDbi.
